Text:
This allso shows how much rubbish that can be made out of math+philosophy.

Firstly there need only to be two doors. The third  is there to make it interesting. Left is a simple case with 50% probability.

You can also write a philosophy book abut a circle and get holy over its continuity...

zappaz...read the book before commenting...that is why it was written, people used poor logic like yourself and thought they knew the answer when they didnt. The question is should u switch doors and the answer is, yes.
